Determine the final locations of a set of items based on their initial positions and a series of swap commands.
Determine the end positions of items based on their initial locations and a series of swap instructions.
A task that involves figuring out the end locations of a group of objects based on their starting positions and a sequence of exchange operations.
Determine the end positions of different items by analyzing their starting locations and the series of exchanges given.
Based on the starting positions of the items and a series of swap commands, determine their final placements.
